movies.title: Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas
movies.plot: The true story of serial killer Henry Lee Lucas.
movies.simplePlot: The true story of serial killer Henry Lee Lucas.

biography.bio: Antonio Sabato Jr. was born on February 29, 1972 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Antonio G. Sabato Jr. He is an actor and producer, known for General Hospital (1963), Amour, gloire et beauté (1987) and The Big Hit (1998). He has been married to Cheryl Moana Marie Nunes since September 25, 2012. They have one child. He was previously married to Tully Jensen.
biography.name: Antonio Sabato Jr.

biography.bio: John Burke was born in Atlanta, Georgia, USA. He is an actor, known for The Amazing Spider-Man (2012), Sicario (2015) and R.I.P.D. (2013).
biography.name: John Burke

biography.bio: Kelly Curran is an actress, known for Argo (2012), Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas (2009) and Into the Grizzly Maze (2015).
biography.name: Kelly Curran

biography.bio: In Greece he became famous when he played an Albanian worker called Ilia in "Love came from far away" I agapi irthe apo makrya (2002) He attended the German School of Athens.
biography.name: Kostas Sommer

biography.bio: Rachel Ferrari is known for her work on Abandoned (2010), The Dog Who Saved Christmas (2009) and Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas (2009).
biography.name: Rachel Ferrari

biography.bio: Kenneth W. Thornton is known for his work on Dances with Wolves (1990), Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas (2009) and A Christmas Wedding Tail (2011).
biography.name: Kenneth W. Thornton

biography.bio: Originally from Stamford, CT, Beth Shea graduated from the College of Charleston in Charleston, SC before moving to L.A. to pursue acting. Beth is the co-founder of Hall of Shea Productions with Leigh Hall. Together they have written, produced, and starred in acclaimed films such as Not in My Family, Love Royale, and Chubduction. In 2011, Beth partnered with Leyna Weber and Annie Lukowski of Working Bug Media, and co-wrote and starred in the hit comedy series "A Series of Unfortunate People." Beth is a graduate of The Groundlings School and the Dee Wallace Stone Acting Studio in Los Angeles. In LA, Beth enjoyed performing improv and sketch comedy at such venues as the Groundlings, Improv Olympic West and ACME Comedy Theater. A proud member of SAG/AFTRA, Beth works in film, television and commercials, represented by Collier Talent Agency in Austin, TX, where she is now based.
biography.name: Beth Shea

biography.bio: Nino Simon is an actor and producer, known for Chicago Massacre: Richard Speck (2007), Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas (2009) and Bundy: An American Icon (2008).
biography.name: Nino Simon

biography.bio: Jay Pickett was born on February 10, 1961 in Spokane, Washington, USA. He is an actor and producer, known for Soda Springs (2012), Port Charles (1997) and Abandoned (2010). He has been married to Elena since 1986. They have three children.
biography.name: Jay Pickett

biography.bio: Daniel Tostenson is an actor, known for Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas (2009), Dracula's Guest (2008) and Chicago Massacre: Richard Speck (2007).
biography.name: Daniel Tostenson

biography.bio: Performer whose career has spanned over 30 years. Particularly called upon to play various delinquents, wackos and psychos in his earlier years, he has matured into a fine screen character actor. His career began in the early 80s with a number of bit parts in movies such as Escape from New York (1981) with Kurt Russell and Stripes (1981) with Bill Murray amongst others before landing a co-starring role in the pilot for Miami Vice (1984) playing Hawiian shirt clad Detective Larry Zito. He continued his role in Miami Vice (1984) for three series before quitting to pursue other roles. He continued his film career and has since appeared in over 80 movies and has made over 40 guest appearances on TV. Notable film credits include The Client (1994), A Time to Kill (1996), Stargate - La porte des étoiles (1994), Nixon (1995) and more recently Pearl Harbor (2001) and a small role as dinosaur chow in Jurassic Park III (2001). He resides in Nashville, TN with his wife, singer Julie Christensen and son Magnus Diehl b. 1993.
biography.name: John Diehl

biography.bio: Caia Coley was born on May 9, 1968 in Atlanta, Georgia, USA. She is an actress, known for 348 (1999), Choosing Matthias (2001) and Abandoned (2010). She has been married to Michael Feifer since April 14, 2001. They have one child.
biography.name: Caia Coley

biography.bio: Ezra Averill is an actor, known for Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas (2009).
biography.name: Ezra Averill

biography.bio: Originally from Rockville, Maryland and the youngest of five children, Thomas Garner has always been drawn to the creative. Truly a chameleon at heart, Thomas enjoys the art and challenge of becoming someone completely different (oftentimes in a comedic fashion), while approaching the material unlike any other. His career path has also seen many diverse avenues which include Professional Cartooning, Illustration, Graphic Design and Technical Illustration for Aerospace. Projects have included several Written (and produced) Screenplays, he Directed and Wrote and Produced an Original Musical Comedy, Illustrated a Children's Book (published), and even wrote Poetry (published). However, It wasn't until he was in his early twenties when he decided to put himself through college for Acting and ultimately move to Los Angeles, CA. Also, along with Acting and Writing, Thomas is an accomplished Acting Teacher and Coach who has helped many Actors achieve their dream of working in Series Regular roles on TV and attaining Lead roles in Feature Films: ColdReadingSuccess.com
biography.name: Thomas Garner

biography.bio: Keleigh Averill is an actress, known for Drifter: Henry Lee Lucas (2009).
biography.name: Keleigh Averill
